message.content: {"id": "116786", "title": "Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path", "description": "When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. Currently, when a library is included, the absolute path is being saved instead of the relative path.", "OB": "The BIRT designer does not generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.", "EB": "The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path for library inclusion in a report design.", "SR": "Modify the BIRT designer to generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
